heading: y2k: dispatches from earth
subheading: it's sixteen days until y2k, and the planet as we know it still exists. still, there's some mighty weird stuff going on. by joanna glasner.
author: joanna glasner
text: philippine cult followers hide in tunnels in fear of impending millennial doom. officials of the second-most populous nation on earth reassure that india is indeed prepared for y2k. oh, except if you count the thousands of hospitals, local banks, and small power stations that may be unprepared.scam artists prey upon the masses aiming to make a quick buck off y2k paranoia.with the rollover to the year 2000 now 16 days away, the world is reacting with government proclamations, criminal schemes, and random acts of individual insanity.here are a few of the most noteworthy dispatches from around the planet:
